# HTMLAudioElement

**Class**

A class representing the HTML `audio` element that plays a sound or audio stream in a webpage. All of the methods and properties in this class are inherited from [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/webkitjs/htmlmediaelement].

## Declaration

```swift
interface HTMLAudioElement
```

## Inherits From

- HTMLMediaElement
title: HTMLAudioElement
